name: Neroli & Basil Extra-Strength Aluminum-Free Deodorant
categories: Bath & Body, Body Care, Deodorant & Antiperspirant
about: What it is: An extra strength aluminum-free deodorant formulated for up to 24 hours of protection...Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Uneven Texture..Formulation: Balm..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free...Fragrance Family: Earthy & Woody..Scent Type: Earthy Greens & Herbs..Key Notes: Neroli, Basil, Shiso Leaf..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Probiotics: Balance skin’s microbiome to neutralize odor and replenish healthy bacteria..- Spirulina: An antioxidant-rich superfood that soothes irritated skin..- Hyaluronic Acid: An ultra-hydrating humectant able to retain up to 1000x its weight in moisture...What Else You Need to Know: This is a high-performance deodorant formulated for all-day protection. It’s an extra strength solid deodorant formulated without aluminum, alcohol, parabens, or phthalates in a captivating and bright scent, Neroli & Basil. Seaweed extracts and hyaluronic acid soothe and moisturize the skin while probiotics help neutralize odor by balancing bacteria...
ingredients: -Probiotics: Balance skin’s microbiome to neutralize odor and replenish healthy bacteria..-Spirulina: An antioxidant-rich superfood that soothes irritated skin..-Hyaluronic Acid: An ultra-hydrating humectant able to retain up to 1000x its weight in moisture...Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tapioca Starch, Magnesium Hydroxide, Sodium Bicarbonate, Ozokerite, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Spirulina Platensis Extract, Fragrance (Parfum), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Lactobacillus Ferment, Tocopherol, Maltodextrin...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to clean dry skin..-For external use only, avoid contact with eyes..-Do not apply to broken skin...Recycling Instructions:.-Recyclable packaging made from recovered ocean plastic and other recycled materials.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s not the strongest deodorant but it’s aluminum free, once you detox the toxics from deodorant with chemicals you won’t smell . I love the scent of it but recently it’s been out of stock . I’m trying other scents but this is my favorite

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells good and works good but the packaging is a no. It leaks and melts and it comes out of the sides. Not in like a liquid all the time but after you use it. The stuff sits on the side weird.
